name: shit tower
description:
a brazilian pizza tower fangame/shitpost

PLAY IN FULLSCREEN

the main protagonist of this game is "O NÓIA" , the noise from paraguay

moveset:

pogo NÓIA(shift+z+arrows)

jump(z)

dash/attack(x)

taunt (c)

enemys:

chedah webah 

mini jonas(the only way to kill them is parrying)

i need money to finish this fangame
